description: The boar that fled from a nudist now has thousands of campaigners looking to protect her.
title: Fans flock to save Berlin's cheeky wild boar
title_page: Fans flock to save Berlin's cheeky wild boar - BBC News
maintext: Speaking to Berlin broadcaster rbb24, she said the sow should be "removed" because there were too many wild boars there, which could get aggressive and could spread disease to humans, including swine fever. Removal, she added, did not mean relocation, because that would require an area to be fenced off.
